author: martinc
msg: Moved Jexl from Commons Sandbox to Commons Proper.

author: rubys
msg: A quick implementation which only redistributes jar files that are
explicitly marked redistributable.  To lessen the burden for this,
one can mark projects, modules, and even entire repositories
redistributables, and an example has been done for each.  The
resulting build scripts have been visually inspected to verify that
At the moment, I can't see any reason to provide the additional
functionallity to explicitly mark that something is NOT redistributable,
but suggestions and alternate implementations are always welcome.

author: vmassol
msg: Changed Eclipse jar locations as per Chris Lenz's good idea. The Eclipse installed package jars need to be moved accordingly. I have updated http://jakarta.apache.org/~vmassol/eclipsejars/ according to the new directory structure. Thanks.

author: morgand
msg: moved Jelly from Commons Sandbox to Commons Proper
